Episodes.Title: Vote Skul
Episodes.Plot:
The spies think they've uncovered a plan by the Grand Master to kidnap the Prime Minister, and stand ready for a daring rescue mission. However, they're shocked to discover that the Grand Master is meeting the Prime Minister to sign a peace treaty. Skul is going legitimate and the Grand Master is a free man!

The Grand Master takes full advantage of his new freedom by announcing his decision to stand in the forthcoming general election. He wants to become the next Prime Minister and if he wins h

Episodes.Title: The B Team
Episodes.Plot:
When Stark enlists the help of The Grandmistress as an MI9 business advisor, she seizes the opportunity to escape and leaves all Stark's agents stranded in the Himalayas. Meanwhile, at St Hope's Rose is upset when Scoop borrows her new model rocket the 'X48' and promptly breaks it.

Frank and the spies remember that the Grandmistress used to run a toy factory and the team head out there hoping to catch her. As Frank and Stark watch with horror from HQ, Rose, Carrie and Oscar are captured by the

Episodes.Title: Ghosts
Episodes.Plot:
When SKUL agent Theo Phantom attacks Rose's friend Bodleian - the world's first artificially intelligent computer - the spies try to stop him, but Bodleian self destructs and Rose is injured in the explosion. Devastated, she is ordered to take leave from MI9.

With another computer hack in progress, Carrie and Oscar use Frank's 'Cyber Visualiser' glasses to follow the electrical signal that leads them to Theo Phantom. However, when they catch up with him, Theo Phantom is shocked and denies any i

Episodes.Title: Total Eclipse
Episodes.Plot:
St Hope's is in a state of excitement as staff and students witness a rare solar eclipse from the playground. As the sun is eclipsed, everyone watches in awe as a colourful spiral appears on the moon's surface, with only Mrs King missing the action. Suddenly Frank receives a warning text from Stark and he sees that the spiral is having a hypnotic effect on everyone.

Frank quickly manages to get Carrie and Oscar away, but is too late to stop Rose being hypnotised. As Mr Flatley and the St Hope's

Episodes.Title: The Gran Master
Episodes.Plot:
Notorious criminal Beryl "the Beefcake" Bagshot, now 85, escapes from prison and is believed to be putting her former gang back together ready for an audacious heist. Her plan is to steal the 'Invigatron': a device that fires beams of healing energy and can repair injuries.The one person Beryl still needs to find is Harry "Fingers" Fulson, now retired from crime and working as a handyman.

Meanwhile, St Hope's are holding a school disco and everyone is expected to bring a partner. Carrie invites

Episodes.Title: The Patient
Episodes.Plot:
Ex-SKUL conman Troy Greek is due to hand over some intel to MI9, but before MI9 can reach him, SKUL discover the plan and inject Greek with a deadly poison. Greek is now in a coma, awaiting the arrival of a vaccine and being kept alive by a machine.

When MI9 discover that a team of SKUL ninjas are out looking for Greek, they send him to the St Hope's base to ensure his protection. Frank agrees, thinking that the school will be empty as the kids are due to be away on a camping trip. Unfortunatel

Episodes.Title: The Crystal of St Helena
Episodes.Plot: The Grandmaster has built a super weapon with only one component missing. Can the agents and Vincent get the device before SKUL? The agents start to be suspicious of Vincent, is he to be trusted?

Episodes.Title: The Wasp
Episodes.Plot: The pupils of St Hope's are annoyed with the new Wasp system, as it forces them to speak properly. A new girl starts at St Hope's, and Rose thinks she is behind the attacks on the Wasp system? But can Lady and Philip Blahga be anything but what they seem?

Episodes.Title: Bully Elliot
Episodes.Plot: The team investigate a dance school that may be hiding a secret. Why are the dancers non-responsive? And is the dance teacher really the enemy?

Episodes.Title: Tim Brown's SKUL Days
Episodes.Plot: When the spies discover a SKUL academy they send Oscar under cover. Why does he stop sending messages to the team? And why does Stark not trust Oscar?

Episodes.Title: The First to Crack
Episodes.Plot: When a deadly poison is stolen from MI9, the spies suspect an eccentric puzzle maker. Will the spies be able to collect the poison and take it back to MI9? What does Pendrix really want?

Episodes.Title: Day of the Jacket
Episodes.Plot: MI9 are on high alert after an enemy spy steals a disguise jacket and kidnaps Dr Baxter. Three new students start at St Hope's, and the spies believe that one of them is the enemy? But can they discover which one it is?

Episodes.Title: The Lost Hero
Episodes.Plot: Oscar walks out on MI9 and plans to infiltrate SKUL. Is Vincent really who he says he is? And will SKUL finally fall?
